text:
Database migration can be
complex and time-consuming.

AWS Database Migration Service (DMS)
streamlines the process, enabling you to assess,

plan, convert, and migrate databases
and data warehouses at scale,

DMS supports migrations for widely used
commercial and open-source databases and data

DMS Schema Conversion with
generative AI speeds up migrations

by minimizing manual work and automating
schema and complex code object conversions.
DMS safeguards your data during migrations by

keeping the source database online and
by continuously monitoring the process.
If any interruptions occur, DMS automatically
resumes from the last checkpoint to ensure zeroÂ data loss.

For high availability, the DMS Multi-AZ option
provides redundant replication instances

across availability zones, enabling
seamless failover and minimizing downtime.

DMS is cost-effective, offering flexible
hourly pricing with no long-term commitments.

With AWS DMS Serverless, capacity management
is automated by dynamically scaling

resources as needed to optimize performance,
while ensuring you only pay for what you use.

Start your database migration
journey today with AWS DMS.
